foreignData.name: Donnerndes Crescendo
foreignData.text:
Du kannst während Deiner Versorgungsphase eine Lyrikmarke auf das Donnernde Crescendo legen.
{R}, opfere das Donnernde Crescendo: Zerstöre bis zu X Länder Deiner Wahl, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Lyrikmarken auf dem Donnernden Crescendo ist.

name: Rumbling Crescendo
originalText:
During your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Rumbling Crescendo.
o
R, Sacrifice Rumbling Crescendo: Destroy up to X target lands, where X is the number of verse counters on Rumbling Crescendo.

rulings.text: Adding a counter is optional. If you forget to add one during your upkeep, you cannot back up and add one later.

text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Rumbling Crescendo.
{R}, Sacrifice Rumbling Crescendo: Destroy up to X target lands, where X is the number of verse counters on Rumbling Crescendo.
